thread.title: Security guard fights for life after Bedfordview armed robbery
thread.title_full: Security guard fights for life after Bedfordview armed robbery | News24

author: news24.com
title: Security guard fights for life after Bedfordview armed robbery
text:
Johannesburg - A man was fighting for his life on Monday morning after being shot in an apparent armed robbery on Van Buuren Road in Bedfordview, Johannesburg.
According to police, a security guard escorting a vehicle carrying cash was shot at.
Police were investigating.
